channel.title: Sports on Lucas Pauker
channel.description: Recent content in Sports on Lucas Pauker

item.title: Baseball Modeling Part 1: Data
item.description: Home runs Since baseball season starts in under a month, I want to create a model for some aspect of baseball. Last year, I made a model to predict the probability that one team wins over another team. However, to calculate that probability accurately, one needs to take into account a lot of variables. This time I want to model something that has less variables. I chose to model player home run probabilities for a game.
